name: Tathagata Chowdhury
headlines: Data Analyst | Student at MCKV Institute of Engineering 👨‍🎓 | Python 🐍 | Machine Learning / AI 🤖
about: I am a student at  MCKV Institute of Engineering. I am pursuing my bachelor's degree in Computer Science(Data Science) (B.Tech) and hope to become a data analyst/data scientist in the future. My hobbies include playing video games, and listening to music.
